info.title: Tasks
info.description:
Tasks are used to keep track of to-dos in Mambu. They are assigned to system users and can be linked to specific clients or groups.   

Using the `/tasks` endpoint, you can retrieve, create, modify, replace or delete tasks.

tags.name: Tasks
tags.description: Allows you to retrieve, create, update or delete tasks. A task represents a human task that can be assigned by a user to another.

get.description: Retrieve a single task specified by its ID or encoded key.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the task.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

put.description: Change multiple values in an existing task object.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the task.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

delete.description:
Delete an existing tasks for all users, including clients and groups.

**WARNING:** Once a task is deleted, it cannot be retrieved again!

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the task.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

patch.summary: Make a single change to an existing task
patch.description: Add, replace, remove or move a single value in an existing task object.

parameters.name: taskId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the task.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patch operations to be applied to a resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Patch operations to be applied to a resource.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

get.description:
Retrieve all tasks, optionally filtered by **user**, **client**, **group** and/or **task status**.


All parameters are optional. The endpoint returns all tasks if no parameters are specified.

The optional parameters `paginationDetails`, `limit`, `offset` and `detailsLevel` can be used to limit the number and length of responses returned.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
Determines how many records will be skipped before being included in the returned results. 

Use in combination with `limit` to paginate results when `paginationDetails` is `ON`.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
The limit for the number of responses to retrieved.   

Use in combination with `offset` to paginate results when `paginationDetails` is `ON`.

parameters.name: paginationDetails
parameters.description:
Specify whether pagination should be enabled or not. Default is `OFF` (pagination disabled). To enable pagination, set this to `ON`.

To further customize the response, the `offset` and  `limit` parameters can be adjusted from their default values. E.g. setting `offset` to `10` and `limit` to `10` returns the second set of 10 items, essentially "Page 2" of our newly paginated response.

parameters.name: detailsLevel
parameters.description: The level of detail to retrieve, for each object representing a task. `FULL` means the full details of the object will be retrieved (including custom fields, address, contact info or any other related object), `BASIC` only returns the first level elements of the object.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Mambu login user name. Not the same as `userId`.

parameters.name: clientId
parameters.description: The id or encoded key of the client.

parameters.name: groupId
parameters.description: The id of encoded key of the group.

Items-Limit.description: Pagination details, the requested page size in the response.

Items-Offset.description: Pagination details, the index of the first returned item in the response.

Items-Total.description: Pagination details, the total available items in the response.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

post.description:
Create a new tasks with the specified parameters.

The status of a newly created task will be set to `open`, unless specified otherwise.

parameters.name: Idempotency-Key
parameters.description:
The Mambu API is designed to be robust in the event of failure. When working with financial transactions, it is especially important that interruptions in communication do not result in accidental data loss or duplication. If a user sends a request but never receives a response, they should be able to safely retry the request without fear of accidentally performing the action twice. In other words, the system should be designed so that 
a request will perform the desired action "exactly once", no matter how often it is repeated. This concept is called [Idempotence](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Idempotence).

The header parameter `Idempotency-Key` is used to support idempotency on this `POST` request. It must be a valid `UUID` string ([version 4 recommended](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Universally_unique_identifier#Version_4_(random))) and can only be used with the exact same request. Can be used in retry mechanisms to prevent double posting.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Specify the properties of the task to be created.

102.description: Your idempotent request was already submitted and is currently being processed, try again later.

401.description: Unauthorized: your credentials are not valid.

403.description: Forbidden: you do not have the necessary permissions for this resource.

Task.description: Tasks are used to keep track of to-dos in Mambu; they are assigned to system users and can be linked to specific clients or groups.

lastModifiedDate.description: The date when the task was last modified.

createdByUserKey.description: The key of the user that created this task.

dueDate.description: The date when the task has to be completed.

creationDate.description: The date when the task was created.

taskLinkKey.description: If the task is related to a client or a group, their ID appears here. If `taskLinkKey` is null, nobody is linked to this task.

createdByFullName.description: Name of the user that created the task.

encodedKey.description: The encoded key of the task, which is auto-generated and unique.

id.description: The id of the task, which is auto-generated and unique.

assignedUserKey.description: Key of the user this task is assigned to.

taskLinkType.description: The type of the owner represented by the task link key.

status.description: The status of the task. A new task always has the status `OPEN`.

RestError.description: The basic schema for error responses is listed below. For more details, please consult the [Mambu error response page](https://support.mambu.com/docs/api-response-error-codes).

PatchOperation.description: A single change made to a resource object.

path.description: The field to perform the operation on.

from.description: The field from where a value should be moved, when using `MOVE` in the `op` parameter.

value.description: The value of the field (can be null).

ErrorResponse.description: The basic schema for error responses is listed below. For more details, please consult the [Mambu error response page](https://support.mambu.com/docs/api-response-error-codes).
